CustomField.description: This field is used to describe the client's selection of product style (e.g. "Seasonal postcard" or "Award Announcement postcard" or "Recipe postcard"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to describe the client's selection of product style (e.g. "Seasonal postcard" or "Award Announcement postcard" or "Recipe postcard"
CustomField.label: Product Style
